channel.title: painted zombies: a half-life 2 work of art
channel.description:
behold the result of gravity-gunning a pot of paint at a pair of zombies (and if the pics dont work this time I will be pissed): [img]https://d1_town_010000[/img] [img]https://d1_town_010001[/img] [img]https://d1_town_010005[/img] [img]https://d1_town_010009[/img]
Edit: for christs sakes. can someone pelase help me, I was looking forward to posting funny screenshots of zombies covered in white paint.
